example.text: It’s pretty clear after reading the Durham Report that the “Russian Collusion” investigation used nearly $40 million in taxpayer dollars to legitimize an opposition research project that had no place in our Justice system.

I was joined in my call for an offshore wind activity moratorium by Congressmen Chris Smith (NJ-4), Jeff Van Drew (NJ-2), and a group of 30 bipartisan mayors along the mid-Atlantic. My joint statement with Rep. Van Drew can be read here.
- Established a select Committee on China to investigate the Chinese Communist Party's corrupting influence. - Voted to end Strategic Petroleum Reserve sales to China.

Increases funding for military information operations assistance to Indo-Pacific allies to counter Chinese influence operations. Ending Wokeness in our Military: Halts the Navy's promotion of a drag queen as a "Digital Ambassador."

Today, much of our nutrition debate focuses on the health inequality of lower-income and minority Americans, while glossing over the root cause of the disparity—unhealthy government-funded food. ? Read my latest op-ed with [[user]] on this topic. [[url]]
- Established a select Committee on China to investigate the Chinese Communist Party's corrupting influence. - Voted to end Strategic Petroleum Reserve sales to China.

Today, with the passage of HRes. 363, we honored the memory of local Officer Glenn Hilliard, who was killed in the line of duty as he pursued a criminal. Officers who risk their lives for our safety deserve our honor, support, and to be fully funded. #NationalPoliceWeek [[url]]
